content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between components

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5) moving materials
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with associated inserters
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Burner inserters at (-6.5,-57.5), (-4.5,-57.5) moving materials

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Organized smelting array consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

### Power Generation at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power setup including:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles creating electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel-related errors
- Ensure mining drills and other fuel-consuming entities have coal loaded before operation
- Keep a stock of coal in inventory for inserting into machines

### Inventory management errors
- Check if you have the required items in inventory before attempting to insert them
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent them from becoming full and blocking operations

### Extraction errors
- Verify you are within range of the target entity before attempting extraction
- Ensure the source entity contains the item you're trying to extract

### Machine connectivity issues
- Make sure all fluid-carrying machines are properly connected via pipes
- Verify power poles are connected to create a complete electrical network
